# Test for ash with pointmass and uniform components

```{r}
  library(ashr)
```


```{r}
  z = c(rnorm(1000,0,1),rnorm(1000,0,2))
  z.ash= ash(z,1,mixcompdist="uniform",method="fdr")
  z.ash$fit$g
```

```{r}
  u = unimix(c(0.5,0.5),c(0,0),c(0,1))
  x = c(-1,0,1)
  s = c(1,1,1)
  compdens_conv(u,x,s)
```
